actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Treasury to make grants to Eisenhower College, Seneca Falls, N. Y., out of proceeds from the sale of silver dollar coins bearing the likeness of the late President of the United States, Dwight David Eisenhower.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to make grants to Eisenhower College, in Seneca Falls, New York, out of proceeds from the sale of silver dollar coins bearing the likeness of the late President of the United States, Dwight David Eisenhower.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Treasury to make grants to Eisenhower College, Seneca Falls, N. Y., out of proceeds from the sale of silver dollar coins bearing the likeness of the late President of the United States, Dwight David Eisenhower.
